contentfulProduct.seoDescription: This long Sherpa Jacket is made from faux shearling. Plush and modern, it is made for chill days and cooler evenings. The straight-cut, knee-length ensures a flattering silhouette while the handwarmer pockets are made for carrying your winter essentials.

content.value: This long sherpa coat is made from 100% recycled polyester fleece. Plush and modern, it is made for chill days and cooler evenings. The straight-cut, knee-length ensures a flattering silhouette while the handwarmer pockets are made for carrying your winter essentials.
Material: 100% recycled polyester fleece

Made from recycled plastic bottles in a mill certified by GRS (Global Recycle System) to help dramatically lower the environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
Bluesign® & OEKO-TEX® certified
Thermal insulation fleece fabric
Standing mock-neck collar for extra warmth
YKK zipper closure with front patch pockets
Origin: Fabric produced in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Garment produced in Hai Duong City, Vietnam.
Model is 5'7" and wearing the long sherpa coat in a size Small
Machine wash cold, inside out with like colors.  Do not use fabric softener.  Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low, do not iron, do not dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 100% recycled polyester fleece
  • Made from recycled plastic bottles in a mill certified by GRS (Global Recycle System) to help dramatically lower the environmental impact by diverting used plastic from landfills and oceans, while consuming much less energy than virgin materials
  • Bluesign® & OEKO-TEX® certified
  • Thermal insulation fleece fabric
  • Standing mock-neck collar for extra warmth
  • YKK zipper closure with front patch pockets
  • Origin: Fabric produced in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Garment produced in Hai Duong City, Vietnam.
  • Model is 5'7" and wearing the long sherpa coat in a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: This long sherpa coat is made from 100% recycled polyester fleece. Plush and modern, it is made for chill days and cooler evenings. The straight-cut, knee-length ensures a flattering silhouette while the handwarmer pockets are made for carrying your winter essentials.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
